page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: Whitchurch is an important transport centre and good communications have helped it remain a shopping and servicing centre for the locality.Two North South trunk{roads,}the A41 and A49,converge on Whitchurch where they are crossed by the A525.Whitchurch sees busy holiday traffic in the summer and throughout the year heavy lorries create noise,smells,vibration and danger to pedestrians.A topical issue in Whitchurch at the present time is that of the proposed by-pass. Most people in Whitchurch depend on private transport.In the town centre there is a conflict between cars and pedestrians,the narrow streets not lending themselves to parking.The long stay car park at White Lion Meadow has improved the situation.
